title: New York Mayor Announces Plan To Reduce Rikers Island Jail Population
teaser: New York City's mayor and the state's chief judge announced a plan Tuesday to cut the number of pre-trial detainees at the notorious Rikers Island jail. It's not unusual for defendants to spend a year or more at Rikers awaiting trial.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
